divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on our deck with daughter and husband, looking up at the stars. I saw a strange dim reddish thing that was traveling at a slow speed , I had no idea what it was I told my daughter(10) to look too, she saw it, (husband never got up to look )we watched this travel N-S, for a few seconds then it did a small zig-zag move then traveled SE at same speed, I am having a tough time describing a shape as I couldn't tell if it were triangular or boomerang, the color was very dim like but you could see it was a reddish tone.It appeared to be very high up , but was fairly large. It was not a plane! this lasted only a minute or two then was gone in the distance. I couldn't keep my eyes off the night sky, I wanted to see it again. I had never seen anything like this before and may not have thought anything(except the color) if it hadn't flew in a zig zag pattern.
Summary: Reddish shape in sky traveling (approx) N-S flying a straight line then did a quick zig zag then flew SE.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Haverhill

This sighting has never been favorited.
